# Kłodzin, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Kłodzin  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Miłakowo, within Ostróda County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  south-east of Miłakowo,  north-east of Ostróda, and  north-west of the regional capital Olsztyn.
